resources.string: Please stop Cuberite before updating the executable
Cuberite failed to start. Ensure the executable uses the following ABI: %1$s
No file manager found, please install one
This service runs Cuberite and ensures that it is not killed by the system
This service downloads, extracts and installs Cuberite

Cuberite stores its worlds on the external storage by default, which is readable and writable by any app. For this, you need to allow Cuberite to write to the external storage. If you don\'t want to give the necessary permission, please select the \"Deny\" option and Cuberite will use the app\'s private storage.
Automatically start Cuberite when your device starts
Use server files stored on an external SD card
Please stop Cuberite before changing the storage location
Use this section from time to time to update your Cuberite installation
Instead of downloading Cuberite, you can use your own compiled executable. Use this only if you understand what you are doing.
Use the WebAdmin to customize your server. A username and password is required, which you can choose below.
Please start Cuberite before using the WebAdmin
Please install Cuberite before configuring the WebAdmin
Restart Cuberite to apply the new login credentials
